Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the glycosyl hydrolase 13 family.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27478151] Gram-negative bacteria :Porphyromonas gingivalis(IC50=13±3 μM).[Ref.26850838] Fungi:Candida albicans(IC50=64±2 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27478151] 0.1% hemolysis at 100 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity gaginst Candida albicans. Important for breakdown of endosperm starch during germination.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity against Porphyromonas gingivalis and mechanism of action of the cationic octadecapeptide AmyI-1-18 and its amino acid-substituted analogs.
Literature.Author: Taniguchi M, Ochiai A, Takahashi K, Nakamichi SI, Nomoto T, Saitoh E, Kato T, Tanaka T

Literature.Title: Effect of alanine, leucine, and arginine substitution on antimicrobial activity against candida albicans and action mechanism of a cationic octadecapeptide derived from α-amylase of rice.
Antimicrobial activity and mechanism of action of a novel cationic ?-helical octadecapeptide derived from ?-amylase of rice
